overwatch.db

Class EnhancedPreparedStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • overwatch.db.EnhancedPreparedStatement

  • public class EnhancedPreparedStatement
extends java.lang.Object
    A nicer interface for PreparedStatements. In this class there is no index-based parameterisation. Instead use <> for parameters. If multiple parameters have the same name, a set assigns to all of them at once.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Lee Coakley

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnhancedPreparedStatement

        public EnhancedPreparedStatement(java.sql.Connection conn,
                         java.lang.String sql)
        Create a new parameterised SQL query or update. Don't forget to return the connection to the database after.
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection to create PreparedStatement on. Needed if you want to lock/transact.
        sql - SQL with parameters.

      • EnhancedPreparedStatement

        public EnhancedPreparedStatement(java.lang.String sql)
        Create a new parameterised SQL query or update. Automatically acquires/releases the connection during construction.
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL with parameters.
